text: Pen bɨ olap apɨl agɨnɨgab, Bɨawl. Yad nep nepin agɨnɨgab agak. Nad bɨ kabɨyam tɨmel yɨbɨl agɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb tap kɨlop okok, nad sɨkim gɨtep gɨl mel, pɨl gɨl tek dɨpan agɨnɨgab agak. Tap wog koslam gɨl yɨbal okok, nad kɨles gɨl nep taw pɨlɨg ñɨban agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak yad nep pɨlɨkɨl, mani yɨl yɨp ñɨnak omɨŋal ak, yokɨp dam tunɨg len mɨdek, mɨñɨl dad opin agɨnɨgab agak.
